name: Sick Day
description:
A game for #selfcarejam

It's just one of those days where you chill and listen to soothing music. Not a care in the world.

WASD and Spacebar are controls

Music by RealFaction and VOEC: http://www.newgrounds.com/audio/listen/703989

https://twitter.com/notbanachtarski

https://twitter.com/RealFaction

Currently you cannot interact with the TV. For now just enjoy some good music by RealFaction and VOEC, and relax!
